name: Choco Milky Sideloading iOS Repo
subtitle: Sideloading library
description: A hosted library of iOS IPAs for sideloading.

apps.name: Nuvio
apps.subtitle: Movie & TV streaming
apps.description: Movie and TV streaming, supports Stremio addons. Status: Working ✅

apps.name: SpotC++
apps.subtitle: Spotify (tweaked)
apps.description: Eevee Spotify Reborn compiled into an IPA file. Status: Working ✅

apps.name: Portal
apps.subtitle: Signer & repo importer
apps.description: IPA signer and repo importer. Status: Working ✅

apps.name: P12Cracker (beta)
apps.subtitle: P12 password cracker
apps.description: Cracks the password of .p12 files. Needs an API key. Status: Working ✅

apps.name: HDFlix
apps.subtitle: Movie & TV streaming
apps.description: Movie and TV show streaming app. Status: Working ✅

apps.name: DebToIPA
apps.subtitle: Convert deb → IPA
apps.description: Convert .deb files into IPA files. (Only works for debs made to be an IPA) Status: Working ✅

apps.name: Cash App++ v5 Trial
apps.subtitle: Tweaked Cash App (trial)
apps.description: Tweaked Cash App with fake money and payments. (Does not give real money) Status: Working ✅
